com.samskivert.util
Class ProcessLogger

java.lang.Object
  com.samskivert.util.ProcessLogger

public class ProcessLogger
extends Object

Reads the output from a process and copies any output to a supplied Logger.

Constructor Summary
ProcessLogger()
           
 
Method Summary
static void copyMergedOutput(Logger target, String name, Process process)
          Starts a thread to copy the output of the supplied process's stdout stream to the supplied target logger (it assumes the process was created with a ProcessBuilder and the stdout and stderr streams have been merged).
static void copyOutput(Logger target, String name, Process process)
          Starts threads that copy the output of the supplied process's stdout and stderr streams to the supplied target logger.

Constructor Detail

ProcessLogger

public ProcessLogger()
Method Detail

copyOutput

public static void copyOutput(Logger target,
                              String name,
                              Process process)
Starts threads that copy the output of the supplied process's stdout and stderr streams to the supplied target logger. When the streams reach EOF, the threads will exit. The threads will be set to daemon so that they do not prevent the VM from exiting.

Parameters:
target - the logger to which to copy the output.
name - prepended to all output lines as either name stderr: or name stdout:.
process - the process whose output should be copied.

copyMergedOutput

public static void copyMergedOutput(Logger target,
                                    String name,
                                    Process process)
Starts a thread to copy the output of the supplied process's stdout stream to the supplied target logger (it assumes the process was created with a ProcessBuilder and the stdout and stderr streams have been merged).

See Also:
copyOutput(com.samskivert.util.Logger, java.lang.String, java.lang.Process)
